text: Celeribacter manganoxidans is a Gram-negative, strictly aerobic, manganese- oxidizing and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Celeribacter which has been isolated from sediments of the Pacific Clarion-Clipperton Fracture Zone in China. ==References== Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria described in 2015
title: Celeribacter manganoxidans
